generation_metadata: The image will feature a bird captured in sixteen different views, arranged in a 4x4 grid. Detailed viewpoints include: front, back, left-side, right-side, top-down, bottom-up, and between these, oblique angles such as front-left, front-right, back-left, and back-right. The bird is illuminated with neutral, even lighting to minimize shadows and maintain consistent visibility of textures and colors across all views. Its features such as feathers, beak, and claws should be crisply defined for accurate detailing. The geometric position of the bird is centered in each sub-image for reliable alignment and comparison. The background is pure white, providing clear contrast and eliminating distractions, facilitating seamless 3D reconstruction.
image_prompt: A set of sixteen digital photographs arranged in a 4x4 grid featuring a bird captured from different angles. Each sub-image shows the bird from a distinct viewpoint: front, back, left, right, top, bottom, and various oblique angles. The bird is centered in each view, with consistent lighting, scale, and positioning. The background is pure white with no shadows or other objects, suitable for 3D reconstruction.
description: The generated image comprises sixteen views of a bird, each captured from a unique angle such as the front, back, sides, top, and oblique angles, providing a comprehensive set for reconstructing its 3D form. The uniform lighting and pure white background ensure that every part of the bird is visible and clear, aiding in detailed model creation.

evaluation_results.suggestions_for_improvement: Improve lighting consistency and add more diverse angles
evaluation_results.metadata_suggestions: Include more specific angle descriptions and lighting details
